Tadelakt Shower Plaster
Price
$179.90
Size:
5 Gallon | 32 lbs
5 Gallon | 32 lbs
Color:
Stone White
Quantity
Color Atelier Tadelakt is designed for use in wet areas like showers, tub surrounds, and backsplashes. It can also be used for decorative dry area applications, and outdoors.
Tadelakt, an ancient lime plaster finish, dates back to Romans, originated in Morocco. For millennia, it has been appreciated for its beauty, and function. Color Atelier Tadelakt is manufactured in America with the highest quality natural ingredients. The artisanal techniques behind the Tadelakt finish have been modernized, making it a popular choice for both luxury residences and commercial properties. Its burnished smooth, waxed, and water repellent finish results in seamless, elegant, and durable applications.
Product description
Experience the elegance of Color Atelier Tadelakt, where surfaces are crafted to be as smooth as silk and as hard as stone with a luxurious feel.
A unique blend of lime plaster creates a beautiful finish that is water-resistant and durable. It will provide an excellent bond to any properly prepared porous substrate, interior or exterior. The mineral pigments are already incorporated into the formula; simply add water to mix. For custom color ordering, please contact us.
Naturally resistant to mold, mildew, and fungus. Tadelakt not only offers a beautiful finish, but it also helps to provide a healthy living environment.
Tadelakt in wet areas requires a certain level of expertise, and knowledge, contact us for further information.
Coverage
32 lbs. will cover approximately 200 sq ft in 1 coat. 2 coats are necessary for application.
Substrate Prep
FOR NON-WET AREAS:
The drywall should be finished to level 3+. Prime with Color Atelier Bonding Primer. Apply Tadelakt once the primer is fully dry. Sealer, Wax are optional.
FOR WET AREAS:
Over the studs, follow either of these recommended methods.
METHOD #1
1. Plywood
2. Waterproof membrane
3. Metal lathe with J-mold casing
4. Scratch + Brown coat (if dried cured for less than two weeks, apply Bonding Primer)
5.
Base
6. Tadelakt
7.
Wax-sealer
or
Wax-paste
METHOD #2
1. Plywood
2. Waterproof membrane
3. Backer boards with J-mold casing
4. Fiberglass mesh + Bonding Primer or Adhesive
5. Base
6. Tadelakt
7.
Wax-sealer
or
Wax-paste
Specification Guide Sheet
Download the spec sheet
Shipping Information
Orders typically ship within 1-to-4 business days. Shipping charges vary depending on your zip code and weight of your orders and will be calculated at checkout.

Designer style and superior security with this Kwikset Signature Series™ product

Meets ADA/ANSI A117.1 requirements

Latch has adjustable backset 2-3/8" to 2-3/4" to fit all standard door preparations
Includes full lip round strike
Locking mechanism functions by pressing the push button on the interior of the lock
Fully reversible lever, can be installed on both right handed and left handed doors
Easily installs in minutes with just a screwdriver
Lifetime mechanical and finish warranty

title: Square Barrel Heavy Duty Hinge | Emtek

metadata.description:
Emtek's Square Barrel hinges offer a unique, modern rectangular spine profile when the door is closed. With smooth action, a solid brass construction and loads of style, we might even venture to say that our Square Barrel Hinges are....sexy?
The hinge barrel also features no exposed screws for an aesthetically clean look, unlike some other options on the market.

metadata.og:title: Square Barrel Heavy Duty Hinge
metadata.og:description:
Emtek's Square Barrel hinges offer a unique, modern rectangular spine profile when the door is closed. With smooth action, a solid brass construction and loads of style, we might even venture to say that our Square Barrel Hinges are....sexy?
The hinge barrel also features no exposed screws for an aesthetically clean look, unlike some other options on the market.

text:
Square Barrel Heavy Duty Hinge | Emtek Shown: Emtek Square Barrel Hinge, Solid Brass, Square Corners, 4-1/2 inch x 4-1/2 inch, Satin Brass US4 Square Barrel Heavy Duty Hinge Finishes ( 10 ) Size ( 3 ) Find a Dealer Description Tech Specs Product Options Emtek's popular Heavy Duty, Square Barrel Solid Brass Hinge is now available in a new, thinner leaf option. While similar in style, the new Square Barrel Hinge option has a more standardized thickness of 0.125" vs the original 0.180" and features a small step on the wing near the knuckle which provides a more pronounced square hinge profile when the door is closed. The hinge barrel also features no exposed screws for an aesthetically clean look, unlike some other options on the market.
  • Sold in Pairs, includes screws
    • For pricing information, contact any Emtek® dealer It's Hip to be Square Emtek's Square Barrel hinges offer a unique, modern rectangular spine profile when the door is closed. With smooth action, a solid brass construction and loads of style, we might even venture to say that our Square Barrel Hinges are....sexy? The hinge barrel also features no exposed screws for an aesthetically clean look, unlike some other options on the market. Heavy-Duty Hinges: Built to handle substantial weight and high traffic. Commonly used in commercial and industrial settings where doors are larger, thicker, and subjected to constant use and abuse. Constructed with durability in mind first. Often made from stronger materials, have reinforced components, and are designed to withstand the wear and tear of high-traffic environments. Typically made from tougher materials like stainless steel or other alloys. Design focuses more on strength and durability than aesthetics. Find applications in commercial and industrial settings, such as schools, hospitals, warehouses, and industrial facilities, where doors are larger, heavier, and experience frequent use. Description:
Calacatta Gold marble is a distinctive white Italian marble with gray and gold veining. Available as marble slabs and marble tile in both honed and polished finishes, this elegant natural stone is the perfect choice to create stunning marble countertops, marble kitchen islands, marble floors and backsplashes. For flexibility in design and installation, a wide range of coordinating wall tiles, floor tiles, and mosaic tiles are available.

DANGER: SILICA DUST HARMFUL IF INHALED.
Exposure to silica dust from cutting, grinding, or polishing product  can cause acute lung injury, silicosis, or cancer.
Wear a respirator when cutting, grinding, or polishing. Use wet cutting methods
and   do not dry cut. Children should not be present during cutting, grinding, or polishing.
For more information, see the SDS at
www.msisurfaces.com/sds-informations.aspx
.
DANGER:
SILICA DUST HARMFUL IF INHALED. Repeated inhalation of respirable crystalline silica dust from cutting, grinding, polishing, intentional breaking, machining, sweeping, or other clean-up tasks during fabrication can cause acute lung injury, silicosis, or cancer.  Wear a respirator when cutting, grinding, polishing, intentionally breaking, machining, sweeping, or cleaning up during fabrication as required by NIOSH and/or the Cal/OSHA standard.  Use wet cutting methods and do not dry cut.  Segregate work that involves repeated cutting, grinding, polishing, intentional breaking, or machining.
Wash contaminated clothing before reuse and do not take work clothes home.
KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN.
For more information, see the SDS at
www.msisurfaces.com/sds-informations.aspx
and rules issued by OSHA and/or Cal/OSHA.

Why you should choose Silestone Charcoal Soapstone
Silestone is a hybrid surface of minerals and recycled materials which can bring colour and texture to your space. Thanks to its exclusive and innovative HybriQ + technology, maintenance is minimal and high resistance to stains and scratches is guaranteed.
Since its creation, Silestone has set major trends in its market, transforming the world of kitchen countertops becoming a benchmark in interior design. Once again, we evolve.

The benefits of Silestone
High scratch resistance
Daily use and wear will not scratch Silestone.
Stain-resistant
Its low porosity makes it highly resistant to stains.
High impact resistance
Highly resistant to daily impacts.
Acid-resistant
Silestone’s low porosity prevents it from being damaged by harsh stains.

It’s easy to care for your Caesarstone countertop.
Simple cleaning
– A splash of warm soapy water will do.
Prevent patina
– Wipe away any liquid spills and splashes.
Removing stains
– Gently rub with an approved cleaner and rinse
Please note that Honed, Concrete and Rough finishes require more cleaning than our Polished finishes. Since there is more exposed surface area with these finishes, metal marks, fingerprints and other signs of daily living will show. Most of these marks can be removed with little effort and non-abrasive cleaning products such as Soft Scrub Liquid Gel.

Details
Cook, serve, and entertain in style with a KRAUS® Kore™ workstation sink. A 2-tier ledge system allows you to slide accessories across the kitchen sink on two levels, doubling your workspace while minimizing clutter on the kitchen counter. Stainless steel sink comes with 10 premium accessories including bamboo cutting board, serving board with bowl and colander, stainless steel dish rack, and roll-up drying rack that allow you to work right over the sink. This Kore™ stainless steel kitchen sink is made with heavy-duty TRU16™ gauge stainless steel for durability with resistance to corrosion, dents, and damage. Undermount sink installation creates a seamless transition from sink to countertop for a modern look and easy cleaning. The oversized
single bowl sink
offers an uninterrupted work surface with ample space for washing your largest baking sheets and cookware while also allowing multiple people to work side by side. Thick NoiseDefend™ sound dampening pads help reduce sink noise for a quieter kitchen. Wear-resistant finish is easy to clean and not prone to corrosion, while rounded corners on the bottom of the sink for kitchen help reduce buildup. Channel grooves and sloped bottom improve drainage, with rear-offset drain that adds storage space under the sink. The installation-ready undermount kitchen sink comes with 2 protective bottom grids and drain with cover. Kore™ sinks are available in a farmhouse sink and drop in sink design that installs with any kind of countertop material
Benefits & Features
THE ULTIMATE WORKSTATION SINK: Innovative 2-tier ledge system allows you to slide multiple accessories across the sink on two levels so you can prep, serve, and clean up right over the sink while minimizing clutter on the kitchen counter
EXTERNAL SINK DIMENSIONS: 45 in. L x 19 in. W x 10 1/2 in. D – BOWL DIMENSIONS: 43 in. L x 16 in. W x 10 in. D – Minimum Cabinet Size: 48 in.
10 ACCESSORIES INCLUDED: Workstation sink comes with heavy-duty cutting board, roll-up drying rack, serving board with bowl and
colander
, stainless steel dish rack, bottom grids (x2), drain assembly with decorative cover, mounting hardware, cutout template
DURABLE 16 GAUGE SINK: Heavy-duty TRU16™ gauge stainless steel sink offers long-lasting durability with great resistance to corrosion, dents, and damage
UNDERMOUNT SINK INSTALLATION creates a seamless transition from sink to countertop with no exposed mounting deck to trap debris – Simplifies cleanup by letting you wipe water and crumbs right into the sink
OVERSIZED SINGLE BOWL SINK with rear-offset drain offers a modern look and ample space for washing your largest baking sheets and cookware; easily fits an entire party’s worth of dishes – DEEP KITCHEN SINK bowl helps reduce kitchen mess and splatter
WEAR-RESISTANT SATIN FINISH with smooth surface is easy to keep clean and not prone to corrosion or rust – Gently rounded corners on the bottom of the stainless steel kitchen sink help prevent build-up for easy maintenance
A QUIET KITCHEN SINK: NoiseDefend™ soundproofing with large silencer pads on all sides of the sink helps reduce noise from dishes and garbage disposal for a quieter kitchen – FULLY INSULATED with anti-condensation undercoating
DESIGNED FOR EASY DRAINING: Sloped bottom with channel grooves helps prevent water from pooling in the sink – OPTIMIZED SLOPE helps keep fragile stemware from tipping over
HEAVY-DUTY BAMBOO CUTTING BOARD is not prone to cracking or warping, with a non-slip design and built-in grooves that help prevent spills – Easy to clean non-porous surface is resistant to odors and stains
SERVING BOARD SET: Solid bamboo serving board holds a large stainless steel mixing bowl and colander – Perfect for tossing salads or straining pasta, made from durable stainless steel with non-slip silicone bumpers that help prevent scratching
ROLL-UP DISH DRYING RACK with heavy-duty stainless steel core and non-slip silicone coating is perfect for drying dishes right over the sink; also comes with stainless steel DISH RACK – Dishwasher-safe and heat-safe
STAINLESS STEEL BOTTOM GRID with soft rubber bumpers promotes better draining and helps protect the surface of your sink from scratches by keeping dishes elevated
STAINLESS STEEL DRAIN ASSEMBLY with easy-to-clean strainer helps keep food and debris from clogging the drainpipe – Removable decorative cover conceals drain opening and garbage disposal for a clean look
INSTALLATION-READY KIT includes all mounting hardware and cut-out template for undermount sink installation
UNIVERSAL DESIGN with clean lines complements any style and creates a modern look in any kitchen – EASY TO CLEAN SINK for kitchen with rounded corners on the bottom of the sink helps prevent buildup over time
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY so you can choose KRAUS® products with confidence – Top-rated US-based customer service means no hassle for the life of your sink
A PERFECT FIT: Kore™ stainless steel sinks with workstation ledge are available in a range of sizes and mounting options to suit any kitchen, including drop in kitchen sink, farmhouse sink, utility sink, and compact bar sink models
RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES (sold separately): Enhance the functionality of your kitchen sink with the Kraus garbage disposal (KWD100-100MBL) that gets rid of food waste in a flash – Recommended
kitchen faucet
(KPF-2631) creates a contemporary look
CERTIFICATIONS: cUPC (ASME A112.19.3/CSA B45.4), MASS

Questions & Answers
What is the minimum required cabinet size?
48" This is to ensure there is enough space within the cabinet for the sink and the included mounting hardware.
Can I install a garbage disposal to this sink?
Yes, garbage disposals are 100% compatible with our sinks. Rather than install a disposal to the drain, the disposal will replace the drain as it has its own flange and mounts directly to the sink.
Are the sink grids dishwasher safe?
Yes, the sink grids are 100% dishwasher safe.
What is the chromium to nickel ratio?
The Chromium to Nickel ratio is 10:18
What is the steel gauge?
TRU 16 Gauge
How far back is the sink wall from the center of the drain?
5"
Can I install this sink in a laminate countertop?
Our undermount sinks are best suited for solid surfaces countertop materials like marble concrete, soapstone and granite. Not well suited for laminate or tile counters which have too many weak points along seams and grout lines to support the weight of the sink.
Can I install it with any type of reveal?
We recommend a positive or flush reveal. A negative reveal would not be recommended as it would cover the workstation ledge.
Can I install this sink reversed?
Yes
Does the bottom have a slope?
Yes, our sinks are engineered with 1/8" slope to easily help guide water towards the drain.
Can I purchase additional feet and bumpers for my sink grid?
Yes, you can purchase additional grid feet and bumpers by contacting us directly at 800-775-0703 or via email at customerservice@kraususa.com
Is there a Colander available?
Yes, our CS-6 Colander pairs beautifully with any of our Workstation sinks.
What accessories are included with this sink?
Our KWU120-45 includes a variety of accessories including: KRM-11BL Rolling Mat, ST-1 Strainer, STC-2 Cover Cap, Bottom Grid KBG-UN1-23, Bottom Grid KBG-WSU1-45, Cutting board KCB-WS104BB, Colander and Bowl Set KAC-1005BB,Dish Rack: KDR-1, Mounting Hardware and cut-out template and we also have additional accessories offered separately
Is there sound dampening material?
Yes, this sink includes NoiseDefend Soundproofing technology and offers extra thick pads covering over 80% of the sink and non-toxic undercoating for added insulation.
What should I use to clean the sink?
We recommend using mild soap and water for everyday cleaning as well as stainless steel cleaners designed for cleaning stainless steel specifically. A popular option is Barkeeper's Friend and a 3M Fine Scotch Brite Pad
Are there any products that should be avoided when cleaning my sink?
We recommend avoiding cleaners with harsh chemicals like chlorine, bleach, ammonia as these items can cause damage to the sink surface.
How can I remove scratches from my sink?
Scratches are inevitable in any sink material, including stainless steel. These are merely usage scratches over time, these scratches will become uniform with the sink's grain and blend into the overall finish of your sink with proper cleaning. Most minor scratches can be softened with a fine (white) 3M Scotch Brite pad, or 3M Scotch Brite Natural Fiber Non-Scratch Scour Pad, accompanied by a deep cleansing agent such as Bar Keepers Friend.
What does "KWU" stand for?
Kraus Workstation Undermount
Can stainless steel sinks rust?
No. Typically, when red spots appear on a Stainless Steel Sink it is simply surface discoloration due to iron and mineral deposits in the water. This is usually taken care of permanently with a stainless steel polish and/or cleaner when used according to the directions of the cleaning product. Products such as Bar Keeper's friend and a fine 3M Scotch Brite pad are both great options.
Is it recommended to drill additional holes in my stainless steel sink?
We do not recommend making additional holes in a stainless steel sink as it could potentially damage and compromise the integrity of the sink.

Details
The KRAUS® Standart PRO™ Series stainless steel kitchen sink features a sleek modern design with straight walls and easy-to-clean rounded corners. This kitchen sink is made with heavy-duty TRU16™ gauge stainless steel for long-lasting durability with great resistance to corrosion, dents, and damage. Undermount sink installation creates a seamless transition from sink to countertop and simplifies cleanup by letting you wipe water and crumbs right into the sink. Large NoiseDefend™ sound dampening pads on all sides of the sink help absorb noise and vibration from dishes and garbage disposals, with insulating undercoating that protects against condensation. Smooth non-porous finish and rounded corners make this stainless steel sink easy to keep clean with minimal maintenance. Sloped bottom with channel grooves promotes easy draining and helps keep water from pooling in the kitchen sink. This
deep single bowl sink
comes with a protective bottom grid and drain assembly with removable strainer. A cut-out template and mounting hardware are provided for undermount kitchen sink installation. Standart PRO™ sinks are also available in a drop in sink design that installs with any kind of countertop material, from wood to stone to laminate
Benefits & Features
STAINLESS STEEL KITCHEN SINK with sleek universal design and easy-to-clean tightly rounded corners works with any decor style, from traditional to modern
EXTERNAL DIMENSIONS: 32 in. L x 19 in. W x 10 1/2 in. D – BOWL DIMENSIONS: 30 in. L x 17 in. W x 10 in. D – Minimum Cabinet Size: 36 in.
KIT INCLUDES: Kitchen sink, protective bottom grids, drain assembly with basket strainer, Kraus kitchen towel, mounting hardware, cutout template
DURABLE 16 GAUGE SINK: Heavy-duty TRU16™ gauge stainless steel sink offers long-lasting durability with great resistance to corrosion, dents, and damage
SINGLE BOWL KITCHEN SINK with rear-set drain offers more room for large cookware and maximizes storage space in the base cabinet – DEEP KITCHEN SINK bowl helps contain mess and splatter
UNDERMOUNT SINK INSTALLATION creates a seamless transition from sink to countertop with no exposed mounting deck to trap debris – Simplifies cleanup by letting you wipe water and crumbs right into the sink
WEAR-RESISTANT SATIN FINISH with smooth surface is easy to keep clean and not prone to corrosion or rust – Gently rounded corners help prevent build-up for easy maintenance
A QUIET KITCHEN SINK: NoiseDefend™ soundproofing with large silencer pads on all sides of the sink helps absorb noise and vibration from dishes and garbage disposals – FULLY INSULATED with anti-condensation undercoating
DESIGNED FOR EASY DRAINING: Sloped bottom with channel grooves helps prevent water from pooling in the sink – OPTIMIZED SLOPE helps keep fragile stemware from tipping over
STAINLESS STEEL BOTTOM GRID
with soft rubber bumpers promotes better draining and helps protect the surface of your sink from scratches by keeping dishes elevated
STAINLESS STEEL DRAIN ASSEMBLY with easy-to-clean removable strainer helps keep food and debris from clogging the drainpipe
INSTALLATION-READY KIT includes all mounting hardware and cut-out template for undermount sink installation
EASY TO CLEAN SINK with rounded corners to help prevent buildup over time – Straight sidewalls and 90° angles maximize usable workspace in the sink for kitchen
UNIVERSAL DESIGN with clean lines and gently rounded corners complements any style and creates a modern look in any kitchen
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY so you can
choose KRAUS® products
with confidence – Top-rated US-based customer service means no hassle for the life of your sink
A PERFECT FIT: Standart Pro™ stainless steel sinks are available in a range of sizes and mounting options to suit any kitchen, including drop in kitchen sink, double bowl and single bowl sink, and compact bar sink models
RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES (sold separately): Enhance the functionality of your sink with the Kraus garbage disposal (KWD100-100MBL) that gets rid of food waste in a flash
CERTIFICATIONS: cUPC (ASME A112.19.3/CSA B45.4), MASS

Questions & Answers
What is the minimum required cabinet size?
36" This is to ensure there is enough space within the cabinet for the sink and the included mounting hardware.
Can I install a garbage disposal to this sink?
Yes, garbage disposals are 100% compatible with our sinks. Rather than install a disposal to the drain, the disposal will replace the drain as it has its own flange and mounts directly to the sink.
Are the sink grids dishwasher safe?
Yes, the sink grids are 100% dishwasher safe.
What is the chromium to nickel ratio?
The Chromium to Nickel ratio is 10:18
What is the steel gauge?
TRU 16 Gauge
How far back is the sink wall from the center of the drain?
4 1/2"
Can I install this sink in a laminate countertop?
Our undermount sinks are best suited for solid surfaces countertop materials like marble concrete, soapstone and granite. Not well suited for laminate or tile counters which have too many weak points along seams and grout lines to support the weight of the sink.
Does the bottom have a slope?
Yes, our sinks are engineered with 1/8" slope to easily help guide water towards the drain.
Can I purchase additional feet and bumpers for my sink grid?
Yes, you can purchase additional grid feet and bumpers by contacting us directly at 800-775-0703 or via email at customerservice@kraususa.com
Is there sound dampening material?
Yes, this sink includes NoiseDefend Soundproofing technology and offers extra thick pads covering over 80% of the sink and non-toxic undercoating for added insulation.
What should I use to clean the sink?
We recommend using mild soap and water for everyday cleaning as well as stainless steel cleaners designed for cleaning stainless steel specifically. A popular option is Barkeeper's Friend and a 3M Fine Scotch Brite Pad
Are there any products that should be avoided when cleaning my sink?
We recommend avoiding cleaners with harsh chemicals like chlorine, bleach, ammonia as these items can cause damage to the sink surface.
How can I remove scratches from my sink?
Scratches are inevitable in any sink material, including stainless steel. These are merely usage scratches over time, these scratches will become uniform with the sink's grain and blend into the overall finish of your sink with proper cleaning. Most minor scratches can be softened with a fine (white) 3M Scotch Brite pad, or 3M Scotch Brite Natural Fiber Non-Scratch Scour Pad, accompanied by a deep cleansing agent such as Bar Keepers Friend.
What does "KHU" stand for?
Kraus Handmade Undermount
Can stainless steel sinks rust?
No. Typically, when red spots appear on a Stainless Steel Sink it is simply surface discoloration due to iron and mineral deposits in the water. This is usually taken care of permanently with a stainless steel polish and/or cleaner when used according to the directions of the cleaning product. Products such as Bar Keeper's friend and a fine 3M Scotch Brite pad are both great options.
Is it recommended to drill additional holes in my stainless steel sink?
We do not recommend making additional holes in a stainless steel sink as it could potentially damage and compromise the integrity of the sink.

Questions & Answers
What is the minimum required cabinet size?
30" This is to ensure there is enough space within the cabinet for the sink and the included mounting hardware.
Can I install a garbage disposal to this sink?
Yes, garbage disposals are 100% compatible with our sinks. Rather than install a disposal to the drain, the disposal will replace the drain as it has its own flange and mounts directly to the sink.
Are the sink grids dishwasher safe?
Yes, the sink grids are 100% dishwasher safe.
What is the chromium to nickel ratio?
The Chromium to Nickel ratio is 10:18
What is the steel gauge?
TRU 16 Gauge T304 Stainless Steel
How far back is the sink wall from the center of the drain?
4 1/2"
Can I install this sink in a laminate countertop?
Our undermount sinks are best suited for solid surfaces countertop materials like marble concrete, soapstone and granite. Not well suited for laminate or tile counters which have too many weak points along seams and grout lines to support the weight of the sink.
Does the bottom have a slope?
Yes, our sinks are engineered with 1/8" slope to easily help guide water towards the drain.
Can I purchase additional feet and bumpers for my sink grid?
Yes, you can purchase additional grid feet and bumpers by contacting us directly at 800-775-0703 or via email at customerservice@kraususa.com
Is there sound dampening material?
Yes, this sink includes NoiseDefend Soundproofing technology and offers extra thick pads covering over 80% of the sink and non-toxic undercoating for added insulation.
What should I use to clean the sink?
We recommend using mild soap and water for everyday cleaning as well as stainless steel cleaners designed for cleaning stainless steel specifically. A popular option is Barkeeper's Friend and a 3M Fine Scotch Brite Pad
Are there any products that should be avoided when cleaning my sink?
We recommend avoiding cleaners with harsh chemicals like chlorine, bleach, ammonia as these items can cause damage to the sink surface.
How can I remove scratches from my sink?
Scratches are inevitable in any sink material, including stainless steel. These are merely usage scratches over time, these scratches will become uniform with the sink's grain and blend into the overall finish of your sink with proper cleaning. Most minor scratches can be softened with a fine (white) 3M Scotch Brite pad, or 3M Scotch Brite Natural Fiber Non-Scratch Scour Pad, accompanied by a deep cleansing agent such as Bar Keepers Friend.
What does "KHU" stand for?
Kraus Handmade Undermount
Can stainless steel sinks rust?
No. Typically, when red spots appear on a Stainless Steel Sink it is simply surface discoloration due to iron and mineral deposits in the water. This is usually taken care of permanently with a stainless steel polish and/or cleaner when used according to the directions of the cleaning product. Products such as Bar Keeper's friend and a fine 3M Scotch Brite pad are both great options.
Is it recommended to drill additional holes in my stainless steel sink?
We do not recommend making additional holes in a stainless steel sink as it could potentially damage and compromise the integrity of the sink.

Details
The KRAUS® Standart PRO™ Series stainless steel kitchen sink features a sleek modern design with straight walls and easy-to-clean rounded corners. This kitchen sink is made with heavy-duty TRU16™ gauge stainless steel for long-lasting durability with great resistance to corrosion, dents, and damage. Undermount sink installation creates a seamless transition from sink to countertop and simplifies cleanup by letting you wipe water and crumbs right into the sink. Large NoiseDefend™ sound dampening pads on all sides of the sink help absorb noise and vibration from dishes and garbage disposals, with insulating undercoating that protects against condensation. Smooth non-porous finish and rounded corners make this stainless steel sink easy to keep clean with minimal maintenance. Sloped bottom with channel grooves promotes easy draining and helps keep water from pooling in the kitchen sink. This
deep single bowl sink
comes with a protective bottom grid and drain assembly with removable strainer. A cut-out template and mounting hardware are provided for undermount kitchen sink installation. Standart PRO™ sinks are also available in a drop in sink design that installs with any kind of countertop material, from wood to stone to laminate
Benefits & Features
STAINLESS STEEL KITCHEN SINK with sleek universal design and easy-to-clean tightly rounded corners works with any decor style, from traditional to modern
EXTERNAL DIMENSIONS: 32 in. L x 19 in. W x 10 1/2 in. D – BOWL DIMENSIONS: 30 in. L x 17 in. W x 10 in. D – Minimum Cabinet Size: 36 in.
KIT INCLUDES: Kitchen sink, protective bottom grids, drain assembly with basket strainer, Kraus kitchen towel, mounting hardware, cutout template
DURABLE 16 GAUGE SINK: Heavy-duty TRU16™ gauge stainless steel sink offers long-lasting durability with great resistance to corrosion, dents, and damage
SINGLE BOWL KITCHEN SINK with rear-set drain offers more room for large cookware and maximizes storage space in the base cabinet – DEEP KITCHEN SINK bowl helps contain mess and splatter
UNDERMOUNT SINK INSTALLATION creates a seamless transition from sink to countertop with no exposed mounting deck to trap debris – Simplifies cleanup by letting you wipe water and crumbs right into the sink
WEAR-RESISTANT SATIN FINISH with smooth surface is easy to keep clean and not prone to corrosion or rust – Gently rounded corners help prevent build-up for easy maintenance
A QUIET KITCHEN SINK: NoiseDefend™ soundproofing with large silencer pads on all sides of the sink helps absorb noise and vibration from dishes and garbage disposals – FULLY INSULATED with anti-condensation undercoating
DESIGNED FOR EASY DRAINING: Sloped bottom with channel grooves helps prevent water from pooling in the sink – OPTIMIZED SLOPE helps keep fragile stemware from tipping over
STAINLESS STEEL BOTTOM GRID
with soft rubber bumpers promotes better draining and helps protect the surface of your sink from scratches by keeping dishes elevated
STAINLESS STEEL DRAIN ASSEMBLY with easy-to-clean removable strainer helps keep food and debris from clogging the drainpipe
INSTALLATION-READY KIT includes all mounting hardware and cut-out template for undermount sink installation
EASY TO CLEAN SINK with rounded corners to help prevent buildup over time – Straight sidewalls and 90° angles maximize usable workspace in the sink for kitchen
UNIVERSAL DESIGN with clean lines and gently rounded corners complements any style and creates a modern look in any kitchen
LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY so you can
choose KRAUS® products
with confidence – Top-rated US-based customer service means no hassle for the life of your sink
A PERFECT FIT: Standart Pro™ stainless steel sinks are available in a range of sizes and mounting options to suit any kitchen, including drop in kitchen sink, double bowl and single bowl sink, and compact bar sink models
RECOMMENDED ACCESSORIES (sold separately): Enhance the functionality of your sink with the Kraus garbage disposal (KWD100-100MBL) that gets rid of food waste in a flash
CERTIFICATIONS: cUPC (ASME A112.19.3/CSA B45.4), MASS

Details
Details
Hugely dramatic, light as a feather and distinctly Dutch, the Random Light (2001) by Bertjan Pot began as a modernist craft project of sorts. After making failed attempts at knitting fiberglass as a means of creating structure, Pot resorted to coiling a strand of epoxy-dipped fiberglass around a large balloon in varying patterns. Once the form had completely dried, the balloon was popped, leaving behind a dramatic globe-shaped form that serves as the diffuser for this stunningly airy pendant lamp. Random Light is suitable for entryways, lounge areas and dining rooms, with a light bulb visible at the center of the globe when lit, creating an all-over glow with minimal glare. Bulb (not included): incandescent 60W/A19/E26. UL Listed. Made in the Netherlands.
This pendant is not precisely spherical, featuring denser fiberglass on the end opposite the bulb access opening. We recommend mounting it no more than 4" from the opening to ensure it emits the most symmetrical lighting pattern.
White and black versions each include a chrome socket, chrome canopy and black cord.
Measure for a perfect fit with our delivery guide: https://www.dwr.com/furniture-delivery-guide.html

Bertjan Pot
Designing furniture, lighting and other home products, Bertjan Pot emphasizes materials, which he sees as a critical but often overlooked element of the design process. Most of his projects are based in experimentation – starting small, playing with a material or technique, following a curiosity about how something might work, or might look.

metadata.description: Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon is a rugged and versatile option for achieving the creative potential of neon lighting.
metadata.og:title: Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon - 2700K - 5m reel
metadata.og:description: Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon is a rugged and versatile option for achieving the creative potential of neon lighting.

text:
Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon - 2700K - 5m reel
The store will not work correctly when cookies are disabled.
Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon - 2700K - 5m reel
Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon - 2700K - 5m reel
Print
Email
Product Number
LN-PF-2700K-5m
Product Features
Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon is a rugged and versatile option for achieving the creative potential of neon lighting. This 2700K CCT strip light is encased in a flexible silicone housing that provides excellent diffusion, and at IP68, it is ideal for indoor and outdoor use. Injection molded ends ensure your lighting will remain free from dust and water.
Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon is UL Listed and can run up to 15 meters when powered from one end. It operates on 24 VDC and is easily controlled using one of our compatible controllers or dimmers. For custom lengths and IP68 wire exits, please call 888-880-1880 or send us an email at
ContactUs@environmentallights.com
.
Key Features:
High-quality silicone casing engineered for durability and ease of maintenance
Silicone casing provides excellent diffusion
Flexible and easy to install
IP68, suitable for indoor or outdoor use
Dust resistant
Run length up to 15 meters when powered from one end
2-meter input and output leads
Compatible connectors available
Sold by the
10 meter reel
,
5 meter reel
and
sample kit
.
Applications
Eluxtra™ ProFlex LED Neon has been designed with professionals in mind. It is suitable for indoor and outdoor applications and is an ideal product for retail, hospitality, scenic and architectural installations.

Details
Mondrian Mirrors (2008) proportionally play off one another and enhance any space. A lightweight extruded aluminum frame surrounds the mirrored glass and lends Mondrian its quiet presence. Each mirror comes equipped with a metal cleat hanging system for vertical or horizontal placement. Polished edges and Masonite backing complete the quality construction. Can be used in damp areas. Made in China.
Proportionally designed to use alone or in a group.
Hang vertically or horizontally with included metal cleat system.
Can be used in damp areas.

Features
Get It Dry the First Time
Our Sensor Dry system measures the moisture levels during the cycle and automatically adjusts the drying time to help ensure you get dry laundry every time.
Get It All Done in Less Time
Ultra-large capacity (7.4 cu.ft.) means you have the room to do more laundry in fewer loads.
Warranty/ Certification
Measure First, Order Right
Nothing is more frustrating than an appliance that doesn’t fit. We’ll help you find the right one for your space.
A Smarter Home Starts with the LG ThinQ® App
The ThinQ app offers control and convenience for smart LG appliances to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Manage and monitor your dryer remotely, track and download cycles, connect with Google or Alexa voice assistants, and more. ThinQ Care appliances send usage, maintenance, and diagnostic alerts to notify you of potential issues and hazards like clogged dryer ducts.
Learn more.
Get It Dry the First Time
Our Sensor Dry system measures the moisture levels during the cycle and automatically adjusts the drying time to help ensure you get dry laundry every time.
De-wrinkle clothes in less time
LG’s TurboSteam™ technology generates steam instantly, so reducing wrinkles and odors is a breeze. That means you can get your favorite shirt back in tip-top shape in just 10 minutes.
Keep Clothes Wrinkle Free
Always forgetting to remove your laundry? No problem. Choosing the Wrinkle Care option periodically tumbles your laundry to keep clothes wrinkle free.

Features
Keep Your Clothes as Fresh as Your Look
Refresh, deodorize and more - all with the power of steam. Enjoy advanced fabric care at home for the ultimate laundry solution.
A Reflection of Your Taste
LG STUDIO Styler’s mirror door finish elevates your space and adds fashion function with a full length reflection. It’s the perfect addition to a closet suite or the finishing touch on your dream laundry space.
Gorgeous on the Outside. Spacious on the Inside.
Keep your clothes looking their best—quickly dry delicates and other wardrobe staples without the fear of shrinking or damage from high-heat dryers.
Refresh With Steam, Every Day
Caring for your favorite wardrobe pieces and for more fabric types is easy with the gentle power of steam.
Just Plug In & Start Refreshing
Plug into an outlet, fill water container & start refreshing. No plumbing required.
Smarter Style Ahead
Use the ThinQ® app to check remaining cycle time, download cycles and more.
A Smarter Home Starts with the LG ThinQ® App
The ThinQ app
1
offers control and convenience for smart LG appliances to help you simplify life and enjoy the comforts of home. Manage and monitor your Styler remotely, track and download cycles, connect with Google or Alexa voice assistants, and access smart diagnosis customer support, and more.

When it comes to investing in laundry appliances, you want the most reliable laundry machines for your home and lifestyle. LG Laundry Sets are long-lasting and built to allow you to complete more loads of laundry in less time. LG Laundry Appliances, including LG Washers and Dryers, are designed to be energy and water efficient and come in a variety of colors, sizes, and styles.
LG’s line of Laundry machines offers innovative features including front-load and top-load LG ThinQ washer and dryer sets with varied capacities, steam technology, 6Motion wash cycle technology, TubFresh technology, Direct Drive motors, TurboWash technology, and TrueBalance. LG Laundry features are dynamically designed to help you get the job done quickly and efficiently.
¹ Available on select LG smart appliances. Features may vary by model.

Why Sub-Zero?
AIR PURIFICATION SYSTEM FIGHTS SPOILAGE, ODORS
Many fresh foods emit ethylene gas, a naturally-occurring compound that hastens food ripening and spoilage. Sub-Zero refrigerators come with an air purification system (based on technology developed by NASA) that scrubs the air of ethylene and odor every 20 minutes.
ADVANCED TEMPERATURE CONTROL
Sub-Zero’s microprocessor controls the interior temperature to within one degree of its setpoint. An advanced air seal around all four sides of the door prevents leaks while conserving energy.
FRESH FILTERED WATER
Sub-Zero's innovative internal water dispenser delivers water free of contaminants, chlorine taste, and odor.
WORRY-FREE WARRANTY
Sub-Zero offers an industry-leading full two-year warranty on appliances, along with a full five-year sealed system warranty and a limited 12-year sealed system warranty.
Learn more
.
RIGOROUS TESTING
Built with premium-grade materials,
Sub-Zero products are designed to last a minimum of 20 years. Major components are subjected to extreme stress tests prior to going into the final design, and every major function is tested before shipping.

Quality and aesthetics meet in a striking stainless-steel interior with a clean, fastenerless design
12 wash cycles and 6 add-on options can be mixed and matched, allowing you to personalize cleaning to your needs
Offers infinite interior variations to meet your dishwashing needs; height-adjustable middle rack and fold-down tines accommodate large pots and tall items
Loading and unloading is easy with interior LED lights that aid in visibility
Stainless or panel-ready options complement any décor and coordinate perfectly with other Sub-Zero and Wolf appliances
Dishwasher disappears into the kitchen with hidden control panel and discreet status light
With our convenient Owner's App, you can remotely start or monitor a cycle, receive alerts when rinse aid is low—even set up auto-replenishment
Cove’s leak protection system offers peace of mind in the rare event of a leak. A conductivity sensor in the base of the unit will automatically stop a cycle in progress if it detects a leak

Why Cove?
FULL FIVE-YEAR WARRANTY
Cove comes with a full five-year warranty on all parts and service—and our unrivaled customer assistance for the life of the product.
SUPERIOR CLEANING
Three wash arms with 45 powerful spray jets, plus a four-stage filtration system, means cleaner water for washing and spotless, dry dishes at the end of every cycle. Mix-and-match wash cycles and add-on options to customize your Cove for ultimate performance.
MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Cove is endlessly adaptable inside and out. Accepting custom panels or coordinating with other Sub-Zero, Wolf, and Cove appliances, it fits into any kitchen design. Even the interior can be configured to your preferences with adjustable heights and tines.
RIGOROUS TESTING
Built with premium-grade materials, Cove products are designed to last a minimum of 20 years. Major components are subjected to extreme stress tests prior to going into the final design, and every major function is tested before shipping.
WHISPER-QUIET OPERATION
Get a head start on the dishes while still entertaining—Cove is designed and built to operate in near silence. A status light is the only way you'll know it is running.

Why Wolf?
Faster Heat, Better Airflow
Wolf's advanced Dual VertiFlow™ convection system preheats faster, improves heat saturation, and distributes for fast, delicious results. There's no need to adjust racks or rotate pans. Two corner column fans with parallel vertical heating elements work in concert to provide just the right heat and airflow for any dish.
New Recipes Made Easy
Gourmet Mode is your go-to for foolproof cooking. Revel in a menu of almost 50 presets of favorite meals made quick and easy. Roasts. Pizza. Vegetables. Gourmet tells you the proper rack position, sets the right cooking mode, even adjusts temperature on its own. All you do is wait until your dish is perfectly done.
Large Capacity
Space—5.1 cu. ft., to be exact, makes this our most spacious built-in oven. The curved back wall increases capacity, aids airflow, and helps accommodate multiple dishes at the same time.
Worry-Free Warranty
Wolf offers an industry-leading full two-year warranty on appliances, along with a limited five-year warranty.

Built with premium-grade materials, Wolf products are designed to last a minimum of 20 years. Major components are subjected to extreme stress tests prior to going into the final design, and every major function is tested before shipping.

Why Sub-Zero?
DUAL REFRIGERATION = OPTIMAL HUMIDITY
Technology pioneered by Sub-Zero features two separate cooling systems so fresh food stays fresher longer in the cool, moist air of the refrigerator. Frigid, dry air prevents frost and freezer burn in the freezer–optimum preservation conditions for each type of food.
AIR PURIFICATION SYSTEM FIGHTS SPOILAGE, ODORS
Many fresh foods emit ethylene gas, a naturally-occurring compound that hastens food ripening and spoilage. Sub-Zero refrigerators come with an air purification system (based on technology developed by NASA) that scrubs the air of ethylene and odor every 20 minutes.
ADVANCED TEMPERATURE CONTROL
Sub-Zero’s microprocessor controls the interior temperature to within one degree of its setpoint. An advanced air seal around all four sides of the door prevents leaks while conserving energy.
FRESH FILTERED WATER
Sub-Zero's innovative internal water dispenser delivers water free of contaminants, chlorine taste, and odor.
WORRY-FREE WARRANTY
Sub-Zero offers an industry-leading full two-year warranty on appliances, along with a full five-year sealed system warranty and a limited 12-year sealed system warranty.
Learn more
.
RIGOROUS TESTING
Built with premium-grade materials,
Sub-Zero products are designed to last a minimum of 20 years. Major components are subjected to extreme stress tests prior to going into the final design, and every major function is tested before shipping.
Envision the possibilities
View Design Gallery

Install multiple Sub-Zero units together for increased personalization
Select right or left Sub-Zero door hinges to designate how doors swing open
Cover the area between the unit and floor with optional kickplates
Coordinate all of your appliances with Sub-Zero pro, tubular, or custom handles

True®'s dual-zone wine storage system has been designed to preserve your favorite vintage. Two independent zones allow for complete flexibility with a temperature range from 40˚F to 65˚F. Equipped with vibration-dampening racks that cradle up to 45 bottles ensures the ideal environment for your collection. Patented TriLumina® LED lighting gently illuminates your wine and allows you to choose from white, amber, or blue. Discover the most versatile wine storage system.
Industry exclusive, 300-series stainless steel interior and exterior.
Zero-clearance hinging allows for integrated installation.
Patented TruLumina® LED lighting gently illuminates your product and allows you to choose from 14 different color options with the push of a button.
Low-E, double pane, UV tinted glass.
True Precision Control® with steel touch technology and readout provides digital accuracy.
5 glide out wine racks and 1 floor cradle accommodate a total of 45 bottles.
Unfinished cherry wine rack handles give you the ability to match surrounding cabinetry.
2 independent zones with dual evaporators that can be adjusted from 40˚F (4.4˚C) to 65˚F (18.3˚C).
TrueFlex® shelving system allows for adjustable organization options.
Sabbath mode compliant.
Ability to connect to a home security system.
All undercounter models UL rated for outdoor use.

Why Sub-Zero?
DUAL REFRIGERATION = OPTIMAL HUMIDITY
Technology pioneered by Sub-Zero features two separate cooling systems so fresh food stays fresher longer in the cool, moist air of the refrigerator. Frigid, dry air prevents frost and freezer burn in the freezer–optimum preservation conditions for each type of food.
AIR PURIFICATION SYSTEM FIGHTS SPOILAGE, ODORS
Many fresh foods emit ethylene gas, a naturally-occurring compound that hastens food ripening and spoilage. Sub-Zero refrigerators come with an air purification system (based on technology developed by NASA) that scrubs the air of ethylene and odor every 20 minutes.
ADVANCED TEMPERATURE CONTROL
Sub-Zero’s microprocessor controls the interior temperature to within one degree of its setpoint. An advanced air seal around all four sides of the door prevents leaks while conserving energy.
FRESH FILTERED WATER
Sub-Zero's innovative internal water dispenser delivers water free of contaminants, chlorine taste, and odor.
WORRY-FREE WARRANTY
Sub-Zero offers an industry-leading full two-year warranty on appliances, along with a full five-year sealed system warranty and a limited 12-year sealed system warranty.
Learn more
.
RIGOROUS TESTING
Built with premium-grade materials,
Sub-Zero products are designed to last a minimum of 20 years. Major components are subjected to extreme stress tests prior to going into the final design, and every major function is tested before shipping.
Envision the possibilities
View Design Gallery
Pro tips
Consider these insider suggestions as you design your space:
Install multiple Sub-Zero units together for increased personalization
Select right or left Sub-Zero door hinges to designate how doors swing open
Cover the area between the unit and floor with optional kickplates
Coordinate all of your appliances with Sub-Zero pro, tubular, or custom handles

View Full Specifications
Why Wolf?
Three Individually Contained Grill Burners
Gain precise independent heat control for more predictably delicious results – with three grill burners, you can sear entrees and warm sides at three different temperatures.
Two Types of Heat for More Thorough Grilling
Two types of heat – direct and radiant from burners and ceramic briquettes – give you nuanced control for everything from seared steaks to grilled fruit to smoked trout.
Infrared Sear Zone
Put a professional sear on ribs, steaks and chicken with 25,000 Btus. Direct infrared heat seals in juices and flavor, while creating the perfect interior fork-tender texture.
Heavy-Duty Stainless Steel Construction
Double-wall stainless steel and heli-arc welding makes for seamless strength and the reason why a Wolf grill may be the last one you'll ever buy.
Worry-Free Warranty
Wolf offers an industry-leading full one-year warranty on outdoor appliances, a limited five-year warranty on outdoor appliance parts, and a limited lifetime warranty on outdoor appliance stainless steel components.
Learn More
.
RIGOROUS TESTING
Built with premium-grade materials, Wolf products are designed to last a minimum of 20 years. Major components are subjected to extreme stress tests prior to going into the final design, and every major function is tested before shipping.
Envision the possibilities
View Design Gallery
Pro tips
Before you finalize your decision:
Consider adding accessory doors or drawers to create a full outdoor kitchen
Coordinate all of your appliances with Wolf red or black knobs
Opt to add an additional in-grill griddle plate (that replaces the grate)
Request a brochure
View the complete line of Wolf products, find design inspiration for your kitchen, and learn how Wolf fuels cooking confidence.
Get My Brochure Now
